review_blob: Got this beer from a friend that went to visit the twin cities over the holidays.  He hit a home run with this one.  I dont know if its the cabin fever or the bordem on winter, but this double IPA get my blood pumping.
For a Porter lover, this beer has everything you need.  It has a nice, dark colored head and a smooth finish.  Its perfect for a Wisconsin winter night in.
This is my mother-in-laws favorite beer.  She doesnt even drink craft beers that often.  To go from Coors Light to Moon Man, it must be good.
beer_name: New Glarus Moon Man No Coast Pale Ale

review_blob: I love this beer.  The roasted malts warms up your taste buds for more. You cannot go wrong with this purchase.
beer_name: Three Floyds Robert The Bruce Scottish Ale

review_blob: HOP HEADS REJOICE!!! This beer is for the pot-smoking rebel in all of us.
Even non-beer drinkers LOVE this beer.  It is the best $8 Christmas or birthday present you can buy!
